channel.title: Music – Katie Lopez
channel.description: Recent content in Katie Lopez on Music

item.title: Kristen Bell,Agatha Lee Monn,Katie Lopez - Do You Want To Build A Snowman?(영화"겨울...")
item.description:
Elsa! do you want
to build a snowman?
Come on
let’s go and play
I never see you
anymore
Come out
the door
It’s like you’ve
gone away
We used
to be best buddies
And now
we’re not
I wish you would
tell me why
Do you want
to build a snowman?
It doesn’t have
to be a snowman
(Go away Anna)
okay bye…

Do you want
to build a snowman?
Or ride our bikes
around the halls?
I think some
company is overdue
I’ve started
talking
To the pictures
on the walls
Hang in there
Joan
It gets
a little lonely
All
these empty rooms
Just watching
the hours tick by

Elsa! please
I know you’re in there
People are asking
where you’ve been
They say
“Have Courage”
And I’m trying to
I’m right out
Here for you
just let me in
We only have
each other
It’s just you and me
what are we gonna do?
Do you want
to build a snowman?
